public NVAPIMosaicGridTopoDto(uint rows, uint columns, bool applyWithBezelCorrect, bool immersiveGaming, bool baseMosaic, bool driverReloadAllowed, bool acceleratePrimaryDisplay, bool pixelShift, NVAPIMosaicGridTopoDisplayDto[] displays, NVAPIMosaicDisplaySettingDto displaySettings)

Parameters

rows uint

Row count.

columns uint

Column count.

applyWithBezelCorrect bool

Whether to apply with bezel correction.

immersiveGaming bool

Whether immersive gaming is enabled.

baseMosaic bool

Whether base Mosaic is used.

driverReloadAllowed bool

Whether driver reload is allowed.

acceleratePrimaryDisplay bool

Whether primary display acceleration is enabled.

pixelShift bool

Whether pixel shift is enabled.

displays NVAPIMosaicGridTopoDisplayDto[]

Display topology entries.

displaySettings NVAPIMosaicDisplaySettingDto

Display settings.
